# Geometry for beam position
#@todo: will need to code this based on pencil beam position

i:So/Example/NumberOfHistoriesInRun = 50000000

# 120 kvP beam from imasim with points at every kev
s:So/Example/BeamPositionDistribution = "Flat"
s:So/Example/BeamPositionCutoffShape  = "Rectangle"
d:So/Example/BeamPositionCutoffX      = 16.66 mm #narrow beam 2mm in diameter
d:So/Example/BeamPositionCutoffY      = 16.66 mm
s:So/Example/BeamAngularDistribution  = "None" 
s:So/Example/BeamEnergySpectrumType       = "Continuous"
